properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 23 THRU 30 MAY
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-49.20S 042-39.75W, 24-47.98S 042-40.40W,
   24-36.90S 042-15.67W, 24-38.12S 042-15.02W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 31 MAY 19.
